duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct financial audits and reconcile bank statements to ensure accuracy and compliance.
Prepare and examine financial records, providing solutions for businesses and individuals.
Oversee AP/AR & Cash Flow Management, including monitoring balances, predicting cash flows, and proposing invoices.
Perform month-end reconciliation, bookkeeping, and generation of financial reports.
Develop and update budget forecasts, providing ongoing oversight and ownership of budgeting.
Assist in year-end audit, tax support, and ensuring tax and legal compliance.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Accounting or Finance (CPA a plus)
